content.question: Christallerâ€™s central place theory argues that which of the following patterns will occur?

choices.label: The site of a city always influences the importance and power of a city.
Land value decreases with increasing distance from the central business district.
Large cities will outnumber smaller towns and cities.
People are more likely to commute to a larger city to find a job.
Cities and towns of similar size will be evenly spaced across a country or region.

content.answer: Cities and towns of similar size will be evenly spaced across a country or region.

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

topic.text: 6.4: The Size and Distribution of Cities

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain a likely outcome in a geographic scenario using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
